description:
Resample a border file to a different mesh.

Resamples a border file, given two spherical surfaces that are in register.  Only borders that have the same structure as current-sphere will be resampled.

current_sphere.title: current_sphere
current_sphere.description: a sphere surface with the mesh that the metric is currently on

new_sphere.title: new_sphere
new_sphere.description: a sphere surface that is in register with <current-sphere> and has the desired output mesh
